paragraphs.content: Chapter 4
paragraphs.contentHtml: Chapter 4

paragraphs.content: So king Solomon was king over all Israel.
paragraphs.contentHtml: So king Solomon was king over all Israel.

paragraphs.content: And these were the princes which he had; Azariah the son of Zadok the priest,
paragraphs.contentHtml: And these were the princes which he had; Azariah the son of Zadok the priest,

paragraphs.content: Elihoreph and Ahiah, the sons of Shisha, scribes; Jehoshaphat the son of Ahilud, the recorder.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Elihoreph and Ahiah, the sons of Shisha, scribes; Jehoshaphat the son of Ahilud, the recorder.

paragraphs.content: And Benaiah the son of Jehoiada was over the host: and Zadok and Abiathar were the priests:
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Benaiah the son of Jehoiada was over the host: and Zadok and Abiathar were the priests:

paragraphs.content: And Azariah the son of Nathan was over the officers: and Zabud the son of Nathan was principal officer, and the king’s friend:
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Azariah the son of Nathan was over the officers: and Zabud the son of Nathan was principal officer, and the king’s friend:

paragraphs.content: And Ahishar was over the household: and Adoniram the son of Abda was over the tribute.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Ahishar was over the household: and Adoniram the son of Abda was over the tribute.

paragraphs.content: ¶ And Solomon had twelve officers over all Israel, which provided victuals for the king and his household: each man his month in a year made provision.
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ And Solomon had twelve officers over all Israel, which provided victuals for the king and his household: each man his month in a year made provision.

paragraphs.content: And these are their names: The son of Hur, in mount Ephraim:
paragraphs.contentHtml: And these are their names: The son of Hur, in mount Ephraim:

paragraphs.content: The son of Dekar, in Makaz, and in Shaalbim, and Beth-shemesh, and Elon-beth-hanan:
paragraphs.contentHtml: The son of Dekar, in Makaz, and in Shaalbim, and Beth-shemesh, and Elon-beth-hanan:

paragraphs.content: The son of Hesed, in Aruboth; to him pertained Sochoh, and all the land of Hepher:
paragraphs.contentHtml: The son of Hesed, in Aruboth; to him pertained Sochoh, and all the land of Hepher:

paragraphs.content: The son of Abinadab, in all the region of Dor; which had Taphath the daughter of Solomon to wife:
paragraphs.contentHtml: The son of Abinadab, in all the region of Dor; which had Taphath the daughter of Solomon to wife:

paragraphs.content: Baana the son of Ahilud; to him pertained Taanach and Megiddo, and all Beth-shean, which is by Zartanah beneath Jezreel, from Beth-shean to Abel-meholah, even unto the place that is beyond Jokneam:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Baana the son of Ahilud; to him pertained Taanach and Megiddo, and all Beth-shean, which is by Zartanah beneath Jezreel, from Beth-shean to Abel-meholah, even unto the place that is beyond Jokneam:

paragraphs.content: The son of Geber, in Ramoth-gilead; to him pertained the towns of Jair the son of Manasseh, which are in Gilead; to him also pertained the region of Argob, which is in Bashan, threescore great cities with walls and brasen bars:
paragraphs.contentHtml: The son of Geber, in Ramoth-gilead; to him pertained the towns of Jair the son of Manasseh, which are in Gilead; to him also pertained the region of Argob, which is in Bashan, threescore great cities with walls and brasen bars:

paragraphs.content: Ahinadab the son of Iddo had Mahanaim:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Ahinadab the son of Iddo had Mahanaim:

paragraphs.content: Ahimaaz was in Naphtali; he also took Basmath the daughter of Solomon to wife:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Ahimaaz was in Naphtali; he also took Basmath the daughter of Solomon to wife:

paragraphs.content: Baanah the son of Hushai was in Asher and in Aloth:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Baanah the son of Hushai was in Asher and in Aloth:

paragraphs.content: Jehoshaphat the son of Paruah, in Issachar:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Jehoshaphat the son of Paruah, in Issachar:

paragraphs.content: Shimei the son of Elah, in Benjamin:
paragraphs.contentHtml: Shimei the son of Elah, in Benjamin:

paragraphs.content: Geber the son of Uri was in the country of Gilead, in the country of Sihon king of the Amorites, and of Og king of Bashan; and he was the only officer which was in the land.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Geber the son of Uri was in the country of Gilead, in the country of Sihon king of the Amorites, and of Og king of Bashan; and he was the only officer which was in the land.

paragraphs.content: ¶ Judah and Israel were many, as the sand which is by the sea in multitude, eating and drinking, and making merry.
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ Judah and Israel were many, as the sand which is by the sea in multitude, eating and drinking, and making merry.

paragraphs.content: And Solomon reigned over all kingdoms from the river unto the land of the Philistines, and unto the border of Egypt: they brought presents, and served Solomon all the days of his life.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Solomon reigned over all kingdoms from the river unto the land of the Philistines, and unto the border of Egypt: they brought presents, and served Solomon all the days of his life.

paragraphs.content: ¶ And Solomon’s provision for one day was thirty measures of fine flour, and threescore measures of meal,
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ And Solomon’s provision for one day was thirty measures of fine flour, and threescore measures of meal,

paragraphs.content: Ten fat oxen, and twenty oxen out of the pastures, and an hundred sheep, beside harts, and roebucks, and fallowdeer, and fatted fowl.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Ten fat oxen, and twenty oxen out of the pastures, and an hundred sheep, beside harts, and roebucks, and fallowdeer, and fatted fowl.

paragraphs.content: For he had dominion over all the region on this side the river, from Tiphsah even to Azzah, over all the kings on this side the river: and he had peace on all sides round about him.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For he had dominion over all the region on this side the river, from Tiphsah even to Azzah, over all the kings on this side the river: and he had peace on all sides round about him.

paragraphs.content: And Judah and Israel dwelt safely, every man under his vine and under his fig tree, from Dan even to Beer-sheba, all the days of Solomon.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Judah and Israel dwelt safely, every man under his vine and under his fig tree, from Dan even to Beer-sheba, all the days of Solomon.

paragraphs.content: ¶ And Solomon had forty thousand stalls of horses for his chariots, and twelve thousand horsemen.
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ And Solomon had forty thousand stalls of horses for his chariots, and twelve thousand horsemen.

paragraphs.content: And those officers provided victual for king Solomon, and for all that came unto king Solomon’s table, every man in his month: they lacked nothing.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And those officers provided victual for king Solomon, and for all that came unto king Solomon’s table, every man in his month: they lacked nothing.

paragraphs.content: Barley also and straw for the horses and dromedaries brought they unto the place where the officers were, every man according to his charge.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Barley also and straw for the horses and dromedaries brought they unto the place where the officers were, every man according to his charge.

paragraphs.content: ¶ And God gave Solomon wisdom and understanding exceeding much, and largeness of heart, even as the sand that is on the sea shore.
paragraphs.contentHtml: ¶ And God gave Solomon wisdom and understanding exceeding much, and largeness of heart, even as the sand that is on the sea shore.

paragraphs.content: And Solomon’s wisdom excelled the wisdom of all the children of the east country, and all the wisdom of Egypt.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Solomon’s wisdom excelled the wisdom of all the children of the east country, and all the wisdom of Egypt.

paragraphs.content: For he was wiser than all men; than Ethan the Ezrahite, and Heman, and Chalcol, and Darda, the sons of Mahol: and his fame was in all nations round about.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For he was wiser than all men; than Ethan the Ezrahite, and Heman, and Chalcol, and Darda, the sons of Mahol: and his fame was in all nations round about.

paragraphs.content: And he spake three thousand proverbs: and his songs were a thousand and five.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And he spake three thousand proverbs: and his songs were a thousand and five.

paragraphs.content: And he spake of trees, from the cedar tree that is in Lebanon even unto the hyssop that springeth out of the wall: he spake also of beasts, and of fowl, and of creeping things, and of fishes.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And he spake of trees, from the cedar tree that is in Lebanon even unto the hyssop that springeth out of the wall: he spake also of beasts, and of fowl, and of creeping things, and of fishes.

paragraphs.content: And there came of all people to hear the wisdom of Solomon, from all kings of the earth, which had heard of his wisdom.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And there came of all people to hear the wisdom of Solomon, from all kings of the earth, which had heard of his wisdom.
